data.text: @JustATrackGuy @RMTunion No covid help, no work, illness and listening to those chumps destroy what they want with no comebacks, now a payrise for it. Sickening. Up the revolution
@JustATrackGuy @RMTunion Same for everyone - you're not unique - but you're making ordinary people's lives a misery - shame on you

@JustATrackGuy @RMTunion I work in the public sector, I worked all through Covid making sure everyone had enough anti-bac. Wipes, soap and hand sanitizer to keep themselves and the children safe. And what did I get? 1% pay increase. As always, MP's are out of touch with reality.
@JustATrackGuy @RMTunion Scum in parliament. Scum in the RMT.

@JustATrackGuy @RMTunion I’ve done the same worked all through covid mainly 6 days a week covering for sickness I’ve done 35 years on track and my body feels it’s age now let the ones who want to take voluntary redundancy go and leave jobs for the younger people and the ones who want to stay
@JustATrackGuy @RMTunion I’m one of this maintenance guys. This is an utter piss take not just for us but the whole country 😡

@JustATrackGuy @CoolJayne @RMTunion All party’s should say how much they are going to pay their MPs should they win and be in government before polling day , Anybody applying for a job don’t get a say what their wages uplift will be half way in the term of employment .

@JustATrackGuy @DaveCol08591776 @RMTunion Remind me, HOW much have they taken from those on UC....oh yeah, just over £2000 a year.
Royally taking the piss.
@JustATrackGuy @RMTunion Solidarity to you and with you 💯.... Bfawu and IWW forever ✊✊✊ strength in unity..✊✊✊
